TopicTitle: Teleportation BUG - Planet or vessel seems to "move" instantly when timewarping in low orbit

Articles.Content:
Hi,

 

I'm having this bug rn, which weirdly only seem to happen in the Jool system (tho I haven't tested all planets). 

As you can see in the video below, the vessel seems to be teleported instantly when I timewarp... Bad thing is that it retains this changed position, which is very bad for gameplay..
ksp.log : https://www.dropbox.com/s/ftic9lit09rsy3r/KSP.log?dl=0

Thanks a lot for your help !
